org.apache.oodt.grid

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.grid.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Configuration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    web-grid configuration. This holds all the runtime configuration of profile servers, product servers, properties, and other settings for the web-grid container.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Configuration(File file)
              throws IOException,
                     SAXException
        Creates a new Configuration instance.
        Parameters:
        file - File containing the serialized configuration.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        SAXException - if the file can't be parsed.

      • isLocalhostRequired

        public boolean isLocalhostRequired()
        Is localhost access required for the configuration?
        Returns:
        True if the configuration must be accessed from the localhost, false otherwise.

      • isHTTPSrequired

        public boolean isHTTPSrequired()
        Is https access required for the configuration?
        Returns:
        True if the configuration must be accessed via https, false if http is OK.

      • setHTTPSrequired

        public void setHTTPSrequired(boolean required)
        Set if https is required to access the configuration.
